name: Red Stare
description:
You are uncontrollably shooting lasers out of your eyes. Retrieve the glasses on top of the building without blowing everything up in this puzzle platformer game!

The goal is simple: get through the building without blowing dangerous stuff such as tnt with your uncontrollable laser eyes, for on top of the building lie the protective glasses that can stop your uncontrollable laser eyes.

Controls: WASD to move, arrow keys to point your laser. To pause, press P (in browser) or esc (in desktop platforms).

This is Cafe Ducha Siesta's entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
You can find us on instagram @cafeduchasiesta (currently mostly in spanish, but soon to be internationalized) Follow us there and/or here at itch if you want to be kept updated about other projects we might work on.

If the game isn't running properly, lags, or shows high audio latency on your browser, you can download it using the links below.  Aditionally, the game was developed in windows, so it will probably run the best there.
